Title: CharmFlyout - A Metro Flyout Custom Control
Description: A custom control for displaying flyouts from the settings charm in Windows Metro style (WinRT) applications written in C# / XAML.
HomeWiki:
CharmFlyout - Another Charming Custom Control for WinRT / Metro Style applications.

Binaries available at: http://nuget.org/packages/CharmFlyout

See a discussion here: http://w8isms.blogspot.com/2012/07/charmflyout-another-charming.html
.
